message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $80 to you, and we're willing to let it go for $75 today. Don't miss out on this opportunity to get a great deal!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount, but I'm looking to pay closer to $70 for this product.  What do you say?
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After considering your request, I am willing to meet you halfway. How about we agree on a price of $68 for the product?
